etri.sdn.controller.protocol.io

Class OFSwitchImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.protocol.io.OFSwitchImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOFSwitch

    public final class OFSwitchImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOFSwitch
    This is the internal representation of an openflow switch. This is a slight modification of OFSwitchImpl of Floodlight.
    Author:
    bjlee
